rooms.description: Open space near the entrance with built-in storage, adhering to Vastu principles by aligning with the northeast direction.
Spacious living area featuring Bohemian decor and ambient lighting. Positioned towards the east for positivity.
Cozy dining space with a central view of the courtyard, promoting social interaction and natural light.
Functional kitchen with ample counter space, designed for efficient workflow while incorporating local aesthetics.
Essential service area including laundry and storage, ensuring smooth circulation between spaces.

openings.description: Main entry door placed in the northeast to invite positive energy as per Vastu.
Large windows installed to maximize natural light and ventilation, aligned with sustainable design principles.
Accessible opening leading to the central courtyard, promoting open-air connectivity and light penetration.

notes: Split-level arrangement provides spatial depth and privacy.
The ground floor is designed with a Bohemian aesthetic emphasizing natural materials, vibrant colors, and eclectic furnishings.
Local building norms have been observed, ensuring structural integrity and compliance with regional guidelines.
Vastu considerations include directional placements for key features.

additional_details.vastu_alignment: Rooms and openings are aligned to optimize flow of energy as per Vastu Shastra.
